name: FRUIT DROPS PART II - Match three puzzle
name_original: FRUIT DROPS PART II - Match three puzzle
description:
FRUIT DROPS PART II - Match three puzzle begins as a simple
match three board game and gradually increases
difficulties as obstacles are added and level
objectives becomes more challenging.

Introducing a new Objective/Obstacle - Netted Fruit.

• FRUIT DROPS PART II introduces the netted fruit
• Addictive match three puzzle game.
• Multiple objectives,challenges and obstacles
• 15 Fruity power up combinations!
• Each level presents you with unique Objectives and Challenges.
• Obstacles mixed with unique level board shapes will keep you swapping and swiping fruits for more!
• Make delicious cascades. Chained power-up madness to level up!
• Three different difficulty levels.
• No In-App purchase (flat fee to own everything)

--------------------------------------------------------

There are four possible objectives on each level.

1. Score quota
2. Removing dark pulps
3. Bringing down popsicles.
4. Free all the fruit from the net.

There are two possible challenges on each level.

1. Complete the objective before time runs out.
2. Complete the objective before you run out of swaps.

--------------------------------------------------------

Obstacles.

1. Fruit crate
2. Fruit Pie
3. Netted Fruit

--------------------------------------------------------

Matching 4 or more fruits rewards the player with
a power up fruit There are 3 power ups.

1. Fruit jar (horizontal and vertical orientation).
2. Double fruit.
3. Sunflower.
